symbols.name: sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl
symbols.description: This is the SAPUI5 composite control by the Enterprise Search Team which helps to make full use of the Enterprise Search Engine features built into ABAP and HANA. It includes a search input box including a suggestion dropdown, a result list which can have different styles including tiles and table, result facets and more. This control is ready to use with an enterprise search backend service but also allows deep modifications to match requirements of adopting applications.

properties.name: cssClass
properties.description: An additional CSS class to add to this control

properties.name: searchTerm
properties.description: Defines the initial search term for the search input.

properties.name: searchOnStart
properties.description: Defines if the search composite control will send a search request after loading for the given term, data source and filter root condition settings.

properties.name: filterRootCondition
properties.description: Defines the filter root condition of a filter tree which shall be applied to the search request. This control only allows filter trees which have a the following structure: complex condition (root level) \ complex condition (attribute level) \ simple condition (attribute value level) Filter root conditions which do not follow this structure won't be accepted and an error will be thrown. Please see the below for a more in-depth example.

properties.name: sinaConfiguration
properties.description: Configuration for the Enterprise Search Client API.

properties.name: dataSource
properties.description: The id of the data source in which it will search right after initialization.

properties.name: resultViewTypes
properties.description: Defines selectable search result view types. The value can be set/get in attach event "searchFinished". Case 1: Search in Apps: result is displayed in a mandatory view type ["appSearchResult"], and it is not switchable. Case 2: Search in All or other Category: result is switchable between different view types. Possible values for the array items are "searchResultList" and "searchResultGrid". Case 3, Search in Business Object: result is switchable between different view types. Possible values for the array items are "searchResultList", "searchResultTable" and "searchResultGrid". Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other.

properties.name: resultViewType
properties.description: Defines active search result view type. The value can be set/get in attach event "searchFinished", and it must be contained in resultViewTypes. Case 1, Search in Apps: result is displayed in a mandatory view type "appSearchResult". Case 2.1, Search in All or other Category (configuration.isUshell !== true): result is switchable between different view types. Possible value is "searchResultList", or "searchResultGrid". Case 2.2, Search in All or other Category (configuration.isUshell === true): result is displayed in a mandatory view type "searchResultList". Case 3, Search in Business Object: result is switchable between different view types. Possible value is "searchResultList", "searchResultTable" or "searchResultGrid". Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other.

properties.name: resultViewSettings
properties.description: Defines a pair of search result view settings. The value is an object of properties resultViewTypes and resultViewType. An example: {resultViewTypes: ["searchResultList", "searchResultTable"], resultViewType: "searchResultList"} Find more detail in the definition of each child property. The value can be set/get in attached event "searchFinished". Function setResultViewSettings prevents incompatibility of sequential execution of functions setResultViewTypes and setResultViewType. Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other.

properties.name: tabStripsFormatter
properties.description: Function callback for formatting the datasource tabstrips in the top toolbar. To the callback function a list of datasources is passed. The callback functions return a modified list of datasources to be displayed in the tabstrips.

properties.name: folderMode
properties.description:
Activates the folder mode. Precondition for folder mode is 1) Search model: In the search model for the current datasource a hierarchy attribute (representing the folders) is defined 1.1) the hierarchy attribute is annotated with displayType=TREE and for the hierarchy there is a helper connector representing the hierarchy or 1.2) the current datasource is the helper datasource representing the folder hierarchy. The hierarchy attribute is annotated with displayType=FLAT 2) Search query: The folder mode is only active in case the search query has an empty search term and no filter conditions (except the hierarchy attribute) are set.

In folder mode and in case a folder filter is set the result view only shows direct children of a folder. In contrast the counts in the facets are calculated by counting direct and not direct children. In case the folder mode is not active the UI uses the search mode: The result list shows direct and not direct children of a folder. * @since 1.106.0

properties.name: folderModeForInitialSearch
properties.description: In case folderMode is set to true this boolean indicates whether for the initial search the folder mode is enabled.

properties.name: autoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode
properties.description: In case folder mode is active: Automatically switch result view type to list in search mode and to table in folder mode.

properties.name: enableQueryLanguage
properties.description: Enables the query language for the hana_odata provider. With query language it is possible for the end user to enter complex search queries with logical operators.

properties.name: applicationComponent
properties.description: Relevant for SAP partners and SAP, the "Application Component" you expect customers to create incidents.

properties.name: facetPanelResizable
properties.description: Display a splitter bar to resize the left hand panel, containing all facets and filter criteria.

properties.name: facetPanelWidthInPercent
properties.description: Default size (percent) of the left hand panel, containing all facets and filter criteria. If "facetPanelResizable" is true, the width of the facet panel can be changed by the user.

properties.name: getCustomNoResultScreen
properties.description: Whenever a search has no results, a 'No Results Page' is displayed. You can provide a custom page to be more specific and add some hints, links, buttons or other content.

properties.name: getSearchInputPlaceholderLabel
properties.description: A callback which returns customized "label" for placeholder text of search box, in case there is no search term. The placeholder text (en) will be "Search In: <customPlaceholderLabel>".

properties.name: overwriteBrowserTitle
properties.description: Shall the window title be overwritten by this control? If true, the control will set the current search condition as window title. If false, it will not set or update the window title.

properties.name: defaultDataSource
properties.description: Data source id which is set when the UI is loaded or filter is reset. If dataSource is also set, dataSource will be used during UI load and this parameter will used only after filter is reset.

properties.name: optimizeForValueHelp
properties.description: The layout is optimized for object selection / value help (narrow view w/o facet panel).

properties.name: filterDataSources
properties.description: Callback for filtering the datasources displayed in the datasource dropdown listbox. The callback gets a list of datsources and returns the filtered list of datasources.

properties.name: facetVisibility
properties.description: A boolean which indicates whether the facet panel is initially openend or closed. This affects only the initial state of the facet panel. When not setting facetVisibility the initial state of the facet panel typically is taken from the user personalization storage.

properties.name: boSuggestions
properties.description: A boolean for enabling (business) object suggestions.

properties.name: displayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults
properties.description: When set to true the facet panel is displayed also in case there are no search results.

properties.name: updateUrl
properties.description: A boolean indicating that the search state is written to the URL.

properties.name: renderSearchUrl
properties.description: A callback for rendering the search URL. The callback gets a list of url encoded parameters and returns the URL string. Typically you need to register this callback in case updateUrl=true.

properties.name: isSearchUrl
properties.description: A callback for checking whether a URL is a search URL. The callback receives a URL and returns true in case the URL is a search URL. Typically you need to register this callback in case updateUrl=true.

properties.name: parseSearchUrlParameters
properties.description: A callback for parsing URL parameters. The callback receices URL parameters and returns modified URL parameters. This is an optional callback. Also in case you set updateUrl=true typcically this callback is not needed.

properties.name: quickSelectDataSources
properties.description: A list of datasources to be displayed in the facet panel in the collection area.

properties.name: selectionChange
properties.description: A callback which is called whenever the selection of result list items changes.

properties.name: initAsync
properties.description: A callback which is called after the initialization of the search composite control.

properties.name: enableMultiSelectionResultItems
properties.description: Enables the multiselection mode of search result items. A checkbox is provided for each result item if the value is true.

properties.name: pageSize
properties.description: The maximal count of search result items displayed on a page after a search. By clicking Show More button, another page of result items of the same count (if available) will be displayed.

properties.name: formatFilterBarText
properties.description: Callback for formatting the filter string to be displayed in the filter bar (for closed facet panel).

properties.name: isFilterBarVisible
properties.description: Callback for checking whether the filter bar is visible.

properties.name: eventConsumers
properties.description: Adds a callback function which is called whenever there is a user triggered event.

aggregations.name: content
aggregations.description: Control instances which are part of this composite control.

events.name: searchStarted
events.description: Event is fired when search is started.

events.name: searchFinished
events.description: Event is fired when search is finished.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructs a new SearchCompositeControl to interact with SAP Enterprise Search Services.

events.name: searchFinished
events.description: Event is fired when search is finished.

events.name: searchStarted
events.description: Event is fired when search is started.

methods.name: addContent

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oContent
parameters.description: The content to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some content to the aggregation {@link #getContent content}.

methods.name: attachSearchFinished

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl itself

methods.description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:searchFinished searchFinished} event of this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl itself. Event is fired when search is finished.

methods.name: attachSearchStarted

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl itself

methods.description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:searchStarted searchStarted} event of this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl itself. Event is fired when search is started.

methods.name: destroyContent

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Destroys all the content in the aggregation {@link #getContent content}.

methods.name: detachSearchFinished

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the {@link #event:searchFinished searchFinished} event of this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

methods.name: detachSearchStarted

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the {@link #event:searchStarted searchStarted} event of this sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

methods.name: extend

returnValue.description: Created class / constructor function

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.

methods.name: fireSearchFinished

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass along with the event

methods.description: Fires event {@link #event:searchFinished searchFinished} to attached listeners.

methods.name: fireSearchStarted

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass along with the event

methods.description: Fires event {@link #event:searchStarted searchStarted} to attached listeners.

methods.name: getApplicationComponent

returnValue.description: Value of property applicationComponent

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getApplicationComponent applicationComponent}. Relevant for SAP partners and SAP, the "Application Component" you expect customers to create incidents. Default value is "HAN-AS-INA-UI".

methods.name: getAutoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode

returnValue.description: Value of property autoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getAutoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode autoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode}. In case folder mode is active: Automatically switch result view type to list in search mode and to table in folder mode. Default value is false.

methods.name: getBoSuggestions

returnValue.description: Value of property boSuggestions

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getBoSuggestions boSuggestions}. A boolean for enabling (business) object suggestions. Default value is false.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getContent content}.

Control instances which are part of this composite control.

methods.name: getCssClass

returnValue.description: Value of property cssClass

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getCssClass cssClass}.

An additional CSS class to add to this control

methods.name: getDataSource

returnValue.description: Value of property dataSource

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getDataSource dataSource}.

The id of the data source in which it will search right after initialization.

methods.name: getDefaultDataSource

returnValue.description: Value of property defaultDataSource

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getDefaultDataSource defaultDataSource}.

Data source id which is set when the UI is loaded or filter is reset. If dataSource is also set, dataSource will be used during UI load and this parameter will used only after filter is reset.

methods.name: getDisplayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults

returnValue.description: Value of property displayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getDisplayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults displayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults}. When set to true the facet panel is displayed also in case there are no search results. Default value is false.

methods.name: getEnableMultiSelectionResultItems

returnValue.description: Value of property enableMultiSelectionResultItems

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableMultiSelectionResultItems enableMultiSelectionResultItems}. Enables the multiselection mode of search result items. A checkbox is provided for each result item if the value is true. Default value is false.

methods.name: getEnableQueryLanguage

returnValue.description: Value of property enableQueryLanguage

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableQueryLanguage enableQueryLanguage}. Enables the query language for the hana_odata provider. With query language it is possible for the end user to enter complex search queries with logical operators. Default value is false.

methods.name: getEventConsumers

returnValue.description: Value of property eventConsumers

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getEventConsumers eventConsumers}.

Adds a callback function which is called whenever there is a user triggered event.

methods.name: getFacetPanelResizable

returnValue.description: Value of property facetPanelResizable

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getFacetPanelResizable facetPanelResizable}. Display a splitter bar to resize the left hand panel, containing all facets and filter criteria. Default value is false.

methods.name: getFacetPanelWidthInPercent

returnValue.description: Value of property facetPanelWidthInPercent

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getFacetPanelWidthInPercent facetPanelWidthInPercent}. Default size (percent) of the left hand panel, containing all facets and filter criteria. If "facetPanelResizable" is true, the width of the facet panel can be changed by the user. Default value is 25.

methods.name: getFacetVisibility

returnValue.description: Value of property facetVisibility

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getFacetVisibility facetVisibility}.

A boolean which indicates whether the facet panel is initially openend or closed. This affects only the initial state of the facet panel. When not setting facetVisibility the initial state of the facet panel typically is taken from the user personalization storage.

methods.name: getFilterDataSources

returnValue.description: Value of property filterDataSources

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getFilterDataSources filterDataSources}.

Callback for filtering the datasources displayed in the datasource dropdown listbox. The callback gets a list of datsources and returns the filtered list of datasources.

methods.name: getFilterRootCondition

returnValue.description: Value of property filterRootCondition

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getFilterRootCondition filterRootCondition}.

Defines the filter root condition of a filter tree which shall be applied to the search request. This control only allows filter trees which have a the following structure: complex condition (root level) \ complex condition (attribute level) \ simple condition (attribute value level) Filter root conditions which do not follow this structure won't be accepted and an error will be thrown. Please see the below for a more in-depth example.

methods.name: getFolderMode

returnValue.description: Value of property folderMode

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getFolderMode folderMode}.

Activates the folder mode. Precondition for folder mode is 1) Search model: In the search model for the current datasource a hierarchy attribute (representing the folders) is defined 1.1) the hierarchy attribute is annotated with displayType=TREE and for the hierarchy there is a helper connector representing the hierarchy or 1.2) the current datasource is the helper datasource representing the folder hierarchy. The hierarchy attribute is annotated with displayType=FLAT 2) Search query: The folder mode is only active in case the search query has an empty search term and no filter conditions (except the hierarchy attribute) are set.

In folder mode and in case a folder filter is set the result view only shows direct children of a folder. In contrast the counts in the facets are calculated by counting direct and not direct children. In case the folder mode is not active the UI uses the search mode: The result list shows direct and not direct children of a folder.

methods.name: getFolderModeForInitialSearch

returnValue.description: Value of property folderModeForInitialSearch

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getFolderModeForInitialSearch folderModeForInitialSearch}. In case folderMode is set to true this boolean indicates whether for the initial search the folder mode is enabled. Default value is false.

methods.name: getFormatFilterBarText

returnValue.description: Value of property formatFilterBarText

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getFormatFilterBarText formatFilterBarText}.

Callback for formatting the filter string to be displayed in the filter bar (for closed facet panel).

methods.name: getGetCustomNoResultScreen

returnValue.description: Value of property getCustomNoResultScreen

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getGetCustomNoResultScreen getCustomNoResultScreen}.

Whenever a search has no results, a 'No Results Page' is displayed. You can provide a custom page to be more specific and add some hints, links, buttons or other content.

methods.name: getGetSearchInputPlaceholderLabel

returnValue.description: Value of property getSearchInputPlaceholderLabel

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getGetSearchInputPlaceholderLabel getSearchInputPlaceholderLabel}.

A callback which returns customized "label" for placeholder text of search box, in case there is no search term. The placeholder text (en) will be "Search In: <customPlaceholderLabel>".

methods.name: getInitAsync

returnValue.description: Value of property initAsync

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getInitAsync initAsync}.

A callback which is called after the initialization of the search composite control.

methods.name: getIsFilterBarVisible

returnValue.description: Value of property isFilterBarVisible

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getIsFilterBarVisible isFilterBarVisible}.

Callback for checking whether the filter bar is visible.

methods.name: getIsSearchUrl

returnValue.description: Value of property isSearchUrl

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getIsSearchUrl isSearchUrl}.

A callback for checking whether a URL is a search URL. The callback receives a URL and returns true in case the URL is a search URL. Typically you need to register this callback in case updateUrl=true.

methods.name: getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl.

methods.name: getOptimizeForValueHelp

returnValue.description: Value of property optimizeForValueHelp

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getOptimizeForValueHelp optimizeForValueHelp}.

The layout is optimized for object selection / value help (narrow view w/o facet panel).

methods.name: getOverwriteBrowserTitle

returnValue.description: Value of property overwriteBrowserTitle

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getOverwriteBrowserTitle overwriteBrowserTitle}.

Shall the window title be overwritten by this control? If true, the control will set the current search condition as window title. If false, it will not set or update the window title.

methods.name: getPageSize

returnValue.description: Value of property pageSize

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getPageSize pageSize}. The maximal count of search result items displayed on a page after a search. By clicking Show More button, another page of result items of the same count (if available) will be displayed. Default value is 10.

methods.name: getParseSearchUrlParameters

returnValue.description: Value of property parseSearchUrlParameters

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getParseSearchUrlParameters parseSearchUrlParameters}.

A callback for parsing URL parameters. The callback receices URL parameters and returns modified URL parameters. This is an optional callback. Also in case you set updateUrl=true typcically this callback is not needed.

methods.name: getQuickSelectDataSources

returnValue.description: Value of property quickSelectDataSources

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getQuickSelectDataSources quickSelectDataSources}.

A list of datasources to be displayed in the facet panel in the collection area.

methods.name: getRenderSearchUrl

returnValue.description: Value of property renderSearchUrl

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getRenderSearchUrl renderSearchUrl}.

A callback for rendering the search URL. The callback gets a list of url encoded parameters and returns the URL string. Typically you need to register this callback in case updateUrl=true.

methods.name: getResultViewSettings

returnValue.description: Value of property resultViewSettings

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getResultViewSettings resultViewSettings}. Defines a pair of search result view settings. The value is an object of properties resultViewTypes and resultViewType. An example: {resultViewTypes: ["searchResultList", "searchResultTable"], resultViewType: "searchResultList"} Find more detail in the definition of each child property. The value can be set/get in attached event "searchFinished". Function setResultViewSettings prevents incompatibility of sequential execution of functions setResultViewTypes and setResultViewType. Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other. Default value is ...see text or source.

methods.name: getResultViewType

returnValue.description: Value of property resultViewType

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getResultViewType resultViewType}. Defines active search result view type. The value can be set/get in attach event "searchFinished", and it must be contained in resultViewTypes. Case 1, Search in Apps: result is displayed in a mandatory view type "appSearchResult". Case 2.1, Search in All or other Category (configuration.isUshell !== true): result is switchable between different view types. Possible value is "searchResultList", or "searchResultGrid". Case 2.2, Search in All or other Category (configuration.isUshell === true): result is displayed in a mandatory view type "searchResultList". Case 3, Search in Business Object: result is switchable between different view types. Possible value is "searchResultList", "searchResultTable" or "searchResultGrid". Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other. Default value is "searchResultList".

methods.name: getResultViewTypes

returnValue.description: Value of property resultViewTypes

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getResultViewTypes resultViewTypes}. Defines selectable search result view types. The value can be set/get in attach event "searchFinished". Case 1: Search in Apps: result is displayed in a mandatory view type ["appSearchResult"], and it is not switchable. Case 2: Search in All or other Category: result is switchable between different view types. Possible values for the array items are "searchResultList" and "searchResultGrid". Case 3, Search in Business Object: result is switchable between different view types. Possible values for the array items are "searchResultList", "searchResultTable" and "searchResultGrid". Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other. Default value is ["searchResultList", "searchResultTable"].

methods.name: getSearchOnStart

returnValue.description: Value of property searchOnStart

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getSearchOnStart searchOnStart}. Defines if the search composite control will send a search request after loading for the given term, data source and filter root condition settings. Default value is true.

methods.name: getSearchTerm

returnValue.description: Value of property searchTerm

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getSearchTerm searchTerm}. Defines the initial search term for the search input. Default value is empty string.

methods.name: getSelectionChange

returnValue.description: Value of property selectionChange

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getSelectionChange selectionChange}.

A callback which is called whenever the selection of result list items changes.

methods.name: getSinaConfiguration

returnValue.description: Value of property sinaConfiguration

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getSinaConfiguration sinaConfiguration}.

Configuration for the Enterprise Search Client API.

methods.name: getTabStripsFormatter

returnValue.description: Value of property tabStripsFormatter

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getTabStripsFormatter tabStripsFormatter}.

Function callback for formatting the datasource tabstrips in the top toolbar. To the callback function a list of datasources is passed. The callback functions return a modified list of datasources to be displayed in the tabstrips.

methods.name: getUpdateUrl

returnValue.description: Value of property updateUrl

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getUpdateUrl updateUrl}. A boolean indicating that the search state is written to the URL. Default value is true.

methods.name: indexOfContent

returnValue.description: The index of the provided control in the aggregation if found, or -1 otherwise

parameters.name: oContent
parameters.description: The content whose index is looked for

methods.description: Checks for the provided sap.ui.core.Control in the aggregation {@link #getContent content}. and returns its index if found or -1 otherwise.

methods.name: insertContent

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oContent
parameters.description: The content to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted

parameters.name: iIndex
parameters.description: The 0-based index the content should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the content is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the content is inserted at the last position

methods.description: Inserts a content into the aggregation {@link #getContent content}.

methods.name: removeAllContent

returnValue.description: An array of the removed elements (might be empty)

methods.description:
Removes all the controls from the aggregation {@link #getContent content}.

Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

methods.name: removeContent

returnValue.description: The removed content or null

parameters.name: vContent
parameters.description: The content to remove or its index or id

methods.description: Removes a content from the aggregation {@link #getContent content}.

methods.name: setApplicationComponent

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getApplicationComponent applicationComponent}. Relevant for SAP partners and SAP, the "Application Component" you expect customers to create incidents. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is "HAN-AS-INA-UI".

methods.name: setAutoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getAutoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode autoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode}. In case folder mode is active: Automatically switch result view type to list in search mode and to table in folder mode. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setBoSuggestions

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getBoSuggestions boSuggestions}. A boolean for enabling (business) object suggestions. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setCssClass

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getCssClass cssClass}. An additional CSS class to add to this control When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setDataSource

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getDataSource dataSource}. The id of the data source in which it will search right after initialization. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setDefaultDataSource

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getDefaultDataSource defaultDataSource}. Data source id which is set when the UI is loaded or filter is reset. If dataSource is also set, dataSource will be used during UI load and this parameter will used only after filter is reset. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setDisplayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getDisplayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults displayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults}. When set to true the facet panel is displayed also in case there are no search results. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setEnableMultiSelectionResultItems

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableMultiSelectionResultItems enableMultiSelectionResultItems}. Enables the multiselection mode of search result items. A checkbox is provided for each result item if the value is true. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setEnableQueryLanguage

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableQueryLanguage enableQueryLanguage}. Enables the query language for the hana_odata provider. With query language it is possible for the end user to enter complex search queries with logical operators. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setEventConsumers

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEventConsumers eventConsumers}. Adds a callback function which is called whenever there is a user triggered event. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setFacetPanelResizable

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getFacetPanelResizable facetPanelResizable}. Display a splitter bar to resize the left hand panel, containing all facets and filter criteria. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setFacetPanelWidthInPercent

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getFacetPanelWidthInPercent facetPanelWidthInPercent}. Default size (percent) of the left hand panel, containing all facets and filter criteria. If "facetPanelResizable" is true, the width of the facet panel can be changed by the user. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 25.

methods.name: setFacetVisibility

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getFacetVisibility facetVisibility}. A boolean which indicates whether the facet panel is initially openend or closed. This affects only the initial state of the facet panel. When not setting facetVisibility the initial state of the facet panel typically is taken from the user personalization storage. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setFilterDataSources

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getFilterDataSources filterDataSources}. Callback for filtering the datasources displayed in the datasource dropdown listbox. The callback gets a list of datsources and returns the filtered list of datasources. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setFilterRootCondition

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getFilterRootCondition filterRootCondition}. Defines the filter root condition of a filter tree which shall be applied to the search request. This control only allows filter trees which have a the following structure: complex condition (root level) \ complex condition (attribute level) \ simple condition (attribute value level) Filter root conditions which do not follow this structure won't be accepted and an error will be thrown. Please see the below for a more in-depth example. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setFolderMode

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property {@link #getFolderMode folderMode}.

Activates the folder mode. Precondition for folder mode is 1) Search model: In the search model for the current datasource a hierarchy attribute (representing the folders) is defined 1.1) the hierarchy attribute is annotated with displayType=TREE and for the hierarchy there is a helper connector representing the hierarchy or 1.2) the current datasource is the helper datasource representing the folder hierarchy. The hierarchy attribute is annotated with displayType=FLAT 2) Search query: The folder mode is only active in case the search query has an empty search term and no filter conditions (except the hierarchy attribute) are set.

In folder mode and in case a folder filter is set the result view only shows direct children of a folder. In contrast the counts in the facets are calculated by counting direct and not direct children. In case the folder mode is not active the UI uses the search mode: The result list shows direct and not direct children of a folder.

methods.name: setFolderModeForInitialSearch

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getFolderModeForInitialSearch folderModeForInitialSearch}. In case folderMode is set to true this boolean indicates whether for the initial search the folder mode is enabled. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

methods.name: setFormatFilterBarText

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getFormatFilterBarText formatFilterBarText}. Callback for formatting the filter string to be displayed in the filter bar (for closed facet panel). When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setGetCustomNoResultScreen

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getGetCustomNoResultScreen getCustomNoResultScreen}. Whenever a search has no results, a 'No Results Page' is displayed. You can provide a custom page to be more specific and add some hints, links, buttons or other content. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setGetSearchInputPlaceholderLabel

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getGetSearchInputPlaceholderLabel getSearchInputPlaceholderLabel}. A callback which returns customized "label" for placeholder text of search box, in case there is no search term. The placeholder text (en) will be "Search In: ". When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setInitAsync

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getInitAsync initAsync}. A callback which is called after the initialization of the search composite control. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setIsFilterBarVisible

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getIsFilterBarVisible isFilterBarVisible}. Callback for checking whether the filter bar is visible. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setIsSearchUrl

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getIsSearchUrl isSearchUrl}. A callback for checking whether a URL is a search URL. The callback receives a URL and returns true in case the URL is a search URL. Typically you need to register this callback in case updateUrl=true. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setOptimizeForValueHelp

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getOptimizeForValueHelp optimizeForValueHelp}. The layout is optimized for object selection / value help (narrow view w/o facet panel). When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setOverwriteBrowserTitle

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getOverwriteBrowserTitle overwriteBrowserTitle}. Shall the window title be overwritten by this control? If true, the control will set the current search condition as window title. If false, it will not set or update the window title. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setPageSize

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getPageSize pageSize}. The maximal count of search result items displayed on a page after a search. By clicking Show More button, another page of result items of the same count (if available) will be displayed. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 10.

methods.name: setParseSearchUrlParameters

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getParseSearchUrlParameters parseSearchUrlParameters}. A callback for parsing URL parameters. The callback receices URL parameters and returns modified URL parameters. This is an optional callback. Also in case you set updateUrl=true typcically this callback is not needed. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setQuickSelectDataSources

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getQuickSelectDataSources quickSelectDataSources}. A list of datasources to be displayed in the facet panel in the collection area. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setRenderSearchUrl

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getRenderSearchUrl renderSearchUrl}. A callback for rendering the search URL. The callback gets a list of url encoded parameters and returns the URL string. Typically you need to register this callback in case updateUrl=true. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setResultViewSettings

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getResultViewSettings resultViewSettings}. Defines a pair of search result view settings. The value is an object of properties resultViewTypes and resultViewType. An example: {resultViewTypes: ["searchResultList", "searchResultTable"], resultViewType: "searchResultList"} Find more detail in the definition of each child property. The value can be set/get in attached event "searchFinished". Function setResultViewSettings prevents incompatibility of sequential execution of functions setResultViewTypes and setResultViewType. Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is ...see text or source.

methods.name: setResultViewType

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getResultViewType resultViewType}. Defines active search result view type. The value can be set/get in attach event "searchFinished", and it must be contained in resultViewTypes. Case 1, Search in Apps: result is displayed in a mandatory view type "appSearchResult". Case 2.1, Search in All or other Category (configuration.isUshell !== true): result is switchable between different view types. Possible value is "searchResultList", or "searchResultGrid". Case 2.2, Search in All or other Category (configuration.isUshell === true): result is displayed in a mandatory view type "searchResultList". Case 3, Search in Business Object: result is switchable between different view types. Possible value is "searchResultList", "searchResultTable" or "searchResultGrid". Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is "searchResultList".

methods.name: setResultViewTypes

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getResultViewTypes resultViewTypes}. Defines selectable search result view types. The value can be set/get in attach event "searchFinished". Case 1: Search in Apps: result is displayed in a mandatory view type ["appSearchResult"], and it is not switchable. Case 2: Search in All or other Category: result is switchable between different view types. Possible values for the array items are "searchResultList" and "searchResultGrid". Case 3, Search in Business Object: result is switchable between different view types. Possible values for the array items are "searchResultList", "searchResultTable" and "searchResultGrid". Note: The value of resultViewTypes and resultViewType must be compatible to each other. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is ["searchResultList", "searchResultTable"].

methods.name: setSearchOnStart

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getSearchOnStart searchOnStart}. Defines if the search composite control will send a search request after loading for the given term, data source and filter root condition settings. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

methods.name: setSearchTerm

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getSearchTerm searchTerm}. Defines the initial search term for the search input. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is empty string.

methods.name: setSelectionChange

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getSelectionChange selectionChange}. A callback which is called whenever the selection of result list items changes. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setSinaConfiguration

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getSinaConfiguration sinaConfiguration}. Configuration for the Enterprise Search Client API. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setTabStripsFormatter

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getTabStripsFormatter tabStripsFormatter}. Function callback for formatting the datasource tabstrips in the top toolbar. To the callback function a list of datasources is passed. The callback functions return a modified list of datasources to be displayed in the tabstrips. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setUpdateUrl

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getUpdateUrl updateUrl}. A boolean indicating that the search state is written to the URL. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.
